name: Super Vadimka III: Enter ALJ
summary: Super Vadimka III: Enter ALJ is a horror-themed, side-scrolling action-platformer developed by VadimBallzGames, released on May 10, 2022, for Windows. The game was created over a span of five months and serves as a sequel to its predecessors, Super Vadimka and Super Vadimka II: Revenge of Dr. Kulik. In this third installment of the Super Vadimka series, players will navigate through daunting cliffs inspired by classic horror elements. The game introduces unique mechanics, such as the ability to throw blue balls and sticks at enemies, along with combatting bosses while striving to endure terrifying scenarios. Players can make use of save functionalities with the F5 and F6 keys, allowing them to track their progress throughout their gaming experience.
